content: cloudburst hat original pattern taken from cloudburst mitts by arienne grey on ravelry size to fit average adult head approx 20 and it will stretch a bit gauge 30 sts and 38 row to 10 cm using 3mm needles materials 1 x regia alpaca soft 100g 310m per 100g 3mm circular needle 40 cm or 3mm dpns stitch marker nb there is enough yarn in the ball to make this hat and the original fingerless gloves from arienne grey on ravelry abbreviations k1 tbl through back loop knit into the back of the stitch k2tog knit two stitches together k2tog tbl knit two stitches together through the back of the stitches so that the decrease lies the other way can also use ssk pm place marker sm - slip marker yo yarn over needle ribbing cast on 140 sts join the round making sure not to twist the stitches first row k1 tbl p1 to end of round pm next 11 row as first row sm at the end of each round this gives approx 3 cm of twisted ribbing decorative and elastic chart 1 lace pattern r 1 k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k4 k 2 decrease tbl k2tog k4 yo k1 yo k1 k2 decrease tbl r 2 k all st ** r 3 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k3 k 2 decrease tbl k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k2 k 2 decrease tbl r 4 k all st r 5 k2tog k3 yo k1 yo k2 k 2 decrease tbl k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k3 k 2 decrease tbl r 6 k all st r 7 k2tog k4 yo k1 yo k1 k 2 decrease tbl k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k4 k 2 decrease tbl r 8 k all st r 9 k2tog k5 yo k1 yo k 2 decrease tbl k2tog yo k1 yo k5 k 2 decrease tbl r 10 k all st ** finish here when hat is long enough before starting crown shaping chart 2 main body next row knit next row work chart 1 row 1 k to end of round next row knit as chart 1 row 2 next row work chart 1 row 3 k to end of round next row knit as chart 1 row 4 these first few row set the position of the pattern within the stocking stitch body when the last chart 1 row is worked go back to row 1 and repeat the 10 row pattern continue working the body of the hat with the pattern insert as set until work measures approx 15cm 6 from cast on edge finishing with chart r 2 on the fifth repeat of the pattern shape crown nb the decreases for the main body are slightly different from the panel decreases so that the panel pattern isn t interrupted too much chart 2 decrease for crown the dashes -- in the middle of the row indicate the centre line of the panel please note that row 12
